title: Walmart reaches deal with South Africa's Massmart holdings for potential takeover offer
text:
The share price offer represents a premium of 53% to the company's closing share price, it added.

"The Massmart independent boardâ€¦ is unanimously of the preliminary view that the terms and conditions of the potential offer are fair and reasonable and intends to recommend to the Massmart board to propose the scheme and support the standby general offer," the company noted.

Write to Sabela Ojea at sabela.ojea@wsj.com; @sabelaojeaguix

Walmart reaches deal with South Africa's Massmart holdings for potential takeover offer
